type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.UnsupportedMethodException
type.description:
Thrown when the tooling API client attempts to use a method that does not exist in the version of Gradle that the tooling API is connected to.

Typically, to resolve such a problem you change/upgrade the target version of Gradle that the tooling API is connected to. Alternatively, you can handle and ignore this exception. @since 1.0-milestone-8
